attributes.title: DISGUSTING
attributes.review: I wanted to download this app and see how our â€œoutstandingâ€ president was doing and his plans for the future. Like someone else mentioned my app also took SEVERAL days to install. When it finally did I opened the app and was horrified! They wanted my mobile number! (To hack me of course.) At the time I was like well our â€œlovelyâ€ president wouldnâ€™t do that to us, but when I entered my number I was spammed with THOUSANDS of pictures of trump! It said say â€œSTOPâ€ to end the robo messages, but when I said stop I received a message saying â€œOpen the app to fund our next project.â€ I opened the app out of curiosity and to my surprise there was a â€œFund our next project buttonâ€ I clicked it and it took me to a page called â€œFunds for paper towelsâ€ As I read what the fundraiser was about I was horrified. And I quote it said â€œAttention American citizens, we need to stock up on paper towels. The paper towels are not for the pandemic but to throw at the Puerto Ricanâ€™s AGAIN if there is another hurricane so they can clean it up themselves.â€ Mortified and offended I went to delete the app. When I clicked delete nothing happened. I clicked it again, nothing. Then I got a bunch of calls to which I declined them all. I blocked trumps number and then I got a text saying â€œYOU CANâ€™T GET RID OF ME I AM YOUR PRESIDENT FOREVER!!!â€. I went to check if he was blocked and HE WASNâ€™T! He HACKED me! I am mortified the only way it stopped was by me smashing my phone with a hammer and then getting it repaired. Bottom line is donâ€™t download this app unless you want to get hacked!
